text: Turbonegro is a punk band from Oslo, Norway. They formed in 1989. They call their style deathpunk, which is a mixture of punk and hard rock. The members are: Hank von Hell (vocals), Happy-Tom (bass), Euroboy (guitar), PÃ¥l Pot Pamparius (guitar, keyboard), Tomas Dahl (drums) Friends of the band are Bam Margera. title: Turbonegro
